ResumeParserData.Experience: HSBC UK  Performance Analyst  July 2018 - Present  Manchester, UK  At HSBC, I am responsible for analyzing business performance and identifying opportunities for improvement. I conduct detailed data analysis using tools like Excel and SQL, and create performance reports for senior management. My role involves collaborating with various departments to gather performance metrics and develop strategies to enhance business efficiency. I also lead process improvement initiatives, resulting in significant operational improvements.  NatWest Group  Junior Performance Analyst  June 2016 - June 2018  Manchester, UK  At NatWest, I supported senior analysts in monitoring and analyzing business performance. My responsibilities included preparing performance reports, conducting variance analyses, and assisting in the development of performance improvement plans. I worked closely with stakeholders to ensure accurate and timely performance reporting. Additionally, I contributed to process improvement initiatives aimed at increasing operational efficiency.
